forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the night cloaks Downtown San Francisco, the city breathes softly beneath a veil of scattered clouds, with temperatures settling comfortably around 51 degrees. A gentle breeze whispers from the south, bearing the scent of the bay and hints of the day’s promise. Morning will dawn with sunshine casting playful glimmers across the iconic skyline, though the warmth will be tempered as the day unfolds, with afternoon temperatures hovering closer to 60 degrees. Expect a southwesterly wind to invigorate the spirit, occasionally rustling the leaves of the pines that line the hills.

While the day starts bright and filled with potential for exploration, the lingering marine layer may still weave its tendrils through the streets, reminding us of the Bay’s enchanting dance with fog. Perhaps a light sweater will be your companion as you meander through charming alleyways or savor a quiet moment at a café terrace. The day holds an invitation to stroll along the waterfront, where the fresh sea air invites deep breaths and the soft crash of waves whispers tales of adventure. This is a day to embrace the delights of the ordinary—whether indulging in a good book at Washington Square Park or visiting the local markets that teem with life.
